title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7857.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7857.1 - General

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the information filing requirements, as determined by the board or by the chair as authorized by the board, applicable to major electricity suppliers and any other entity from which the
board deems appropriate to collect such information, including but not limited
to the bulk system operator and the NYSRC. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7857.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
